channel.title: A question for a professional coder (help please)
channel.description:
i just downloaded figments f2p server... it sucks... but im working to make it better, however there are some things that i want to change but i cant... i cant find the values so please reply to these questions
1. how to i change weapon timers? i want the rune 2h to have the same timer as runescape, along with the maple shortbow and rune scimitar
2. i cant seem to change the max hit for adamant arrows
3. i want to change the speed of training
ANY of these questions answered would be nice thank you
2h slapped
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2009, 07:08:07 pm[/size][hr]also, top helper will be given hidden admin, thanks

item.title: A question for a professional coder (help please)
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

For XP rates, search “hitDiff” in client class.

Read full topic

item.title: A question for a professional coder (help please)
item.dc:creator: @baez9 baez9
item.description:
@baez9 wrote:

1: Find [CODE] public boolean Attack () { and it should be under it.

2:That all depends on the bonuses of what your wearing to hit higher, to change those bonuses, its all in item.cfg

3:Find the exp rate and search it in client.java and post on here what do you get.[/code]

Read full topic
